src:
REZZIME DANA (subota): U Premijer ligi berićetno, u Primeri probušena vreća sa dobitkom
Pogledajte ko vam je 2. novembra doneo novac, a ko vas je prodao...

02 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici REZZIME DANA novinari portala MOZZART Sport koriste podatke kladionice MOZZART o najigranijim parovima tog dana, i na osnovu toga sumiraju koji su od najigranijih tipova prošli, a koji nisu.
OVDE pogledajte kako smo mi prošli u rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA.
Evo kako ste vi tipovali...

ZAOKRUŽENO

ASTON VILA - LIVERPUL (tip 2, kvota 1,40) - rezultat 1:2Taman što smo pomislili da će navijači Redsa posegnuti za raznim teorijama zavere o video tehnologijii, ukazao se Sadio Mane – i on ih je prethodno nervirao kada je pokušao simulacijom da iznudi jedanaesterac za Redse – koji je u petom minutu sudijske nadoknade glavom sproveo savršen centaršut slavljenika Trenta Aleksander-Arnolda, igrao je on svoju 100 utakmicu u Liverpulovom dresu, u Vilinu mrežu za konačnih 2:1. IZVEŠTAJ.
VOTFORD - ČELSI (tip 2, kvota 1,70) - rezultat 1:2Ova deca se ne boje stršljenova! Nikakve žaoke ne izazivaju jezu za Čelsijev “vrtić”. Još jedna pobeda, još jedan glatki trijumf u gostima, da se ostane za vratom Mančester sitiju. Plavci su protutnjali kroz Votford za petu uzastopnu pobedu u ligi – 2:1. IZVEŠTAJ.
RB LAJPCIG - MAJNC (tip 1, kvota 1,35) - rezultat 8:0Najbolju partiju ovog popodneva pružio je Lajpcig koji je ponizio Majnc sa čak 8:0. Timo Verner koji je dao het-trik i čak pet različitih strelaca bili su surovi prema ekipi Sandra Švarca koji bi takođe mogao večeras da ostane bez posla jer njegov tim ne igra na nivou Bundeslige. IZVEŠTAJ.
KLUB BRIŽ - KORTRTAJK (tip 1, kvota 1,20) - rezultat 3:0Ni posle 14 kola Klub Briž ne zna za poraz u Belgiji. Plavo-beli sa Jan Brejdel stadiona niže uspehe i već ima opipljivu prednost u odnosu na rivale. Ali, što je još bitnije, tim Filipa Klementa igra besprekorno, pa se protiv Kortrijka pitanje oko konačnog ishoda nije ni postavljalo – 3:0. IZVEŠTAJ.
BENFIKA - RIO AVE (tip 1, kvota 1,32) - rezultat 2:0Benfika radi sve da ubije moral direktnim rivalima za titulu! Lavovi su završili još jedan meč bez ogrebotine. Lako je na Luži pao Rio Ave (2:0). Poslednji gol u prvenstvu Lavovi su primili još 21. septembra od Moreirensea. Od tada su zategli defanzivu i navijačima darivali trijumfe bez imalo stresa. Mnogo aplauza bilo je ove večeri na Lužu. Zlatno Benfikino dete Ruben Diaz u 100. meču za prvi tim postigao je efektan pogodak. IZVEŠTAJ.
TORINO - JUVENTUS (tip 2, kvota 1,55) - rezultat 0:1U Derbiju dela Mole, Juve je minimalcem (1:0) savladao Toro i produbio mu agoniju, a centralna figura meča je bio štoper Matijs de Liht. Holanđanin je na poečtku mečamogao da košta Juventus kada mu je sudija progledao kroz prste za očigledno igranje rukom ,a potom je postigao jedini gol na meču i našao šifru za svemogućeg Salvatorea Sirigua na golu Granata. Da je Toro izvukao bod, iskusni golman bi bez dileme bio junak tog podviga. A i ovako je verovatno bio najbolji pojedinac meča. IZVEŠTAJ.
AZ ALKMAR - TVENTE (tip 1, kvota 1,18) - rezultat 3:0Tri poslednje utakmice – 13 golova AZ-a! Na koga se obruši dečurlija iz Alkmara, od njega ostaju samo dugmići. Šest komada Astani (6:0), četiri PSV Ajndhovenu (4:0) i večeras tri Tventeu (3:0). I sve pobede bez primljenog gola. Malo je trenutno ekipa u Evropi u tako fantastičnoj formi i u napadu i u defanzivi. IZVEŠTAJ.

PRECRTANO

LEVANTE - BARSELONA (tip 2, kvota 1,33) - rezultat 3:1Taman kad se učinilo da je Barsa posle sedam vezanih pobeda u svim takmičenjima uhvatila zamajac, usledilo je novo bolno prizemljenje za šampiona Španije. Leo Mesi i drugari počišćeni su za samo šest minuta na gostovanju u Valensiji protiv sjajnog Levantea, koji ih je nadigrao u drugom poluvremenu. Vrednu pobedu bordo-plavih pamtiće i srpski reprezentativac Nemanja Radoja koji je postigao prvenac u dresu novog tima, a posle sjajnog udarca levicom sa ivice šesnaesterca za konačnih 3:1. IZVEŠTAJ.
SPARTA ROTERDAM - PSV (tip 2, kvota 1,85) - rezultat 2:2Skoro da je gotovo! PSV po svoj prilici nema snage da trči šampionsku trku sa Ajaksom što je postalo jasno posle trećeg vezanog kiksa ekipe Marka van Bomela u Eredviziji. Nije poraz kao u prethodna dva navrata, ali remi sa Spartom u Roterdamu (2:2) teško da će zadovoljiti funkcionere ovog velikog kluba. IZVEŠTAJ.
REAL MADRID - BETIS (tip 1, kvota 1,25) - rezultat 0:0Prvo senzacionalna pobeda Levantea nad Barselonom, pa remi Sevilje i Atletika u derbiju kola, a sada i kiks Reala usred Madrida. Jer na stadionu “Santjago Bernabeu“ očekivalo se da će Kraljevski klub lako izaći na kraj sa Betisom, Rubijeva četa se pošteno muči ove sezone, ali koliko su Verdiblankosi neugodan rival videlo se i večeras. Real je imao loptu u nogama, imao je i više šansi, čak je jednom i proturio loptu u protivničku mrežu, ali je na kraju morao da se pomiri sa remijem bez golova. IZVEŠTAJ.
text:
DAILY SUMMARY (Saturday): In the Premier League, biracially, in Primera, a punching bag with a win
Take a look at who brought you the money on November 2, and who sold you ...

02 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the DAY SUMMARY section, MOZZART Sport reporters use the MOZZART bookmakers' data on the most played pairs of the day, summarizing which of the most played types have passed and which have not.
See here how we went in the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section.
Here's how you guys typed ...

ROUNDED

ASTON VILLA - LIVERPUL (Type 2, odds 1.40) - Score 1: 2Because we thought Reds fans would resort to various conspiracy theories about video technology, Sadio Mane showed up - and he had previously annoyed them when he tried to simulate that Reds scored a penalty kick - which in the fifth minute of the referee's header was played by the perfect center-back of the celebrated Trent Alexander-Arnold, he played his 100 game in Liverpool's jersey, in the Fairy net for the final 2: 1. REPORT.
WATFORD - CHELSEA (Type 2, odds 1.70) - Score 1: 2 These kids are not scared of horrors! No jingles provoke a dam for Chelsea's nursery. Another win, another smooth triumph away to stay behind Manchester City. The swimmers swept through Watford for the fifth consecutive league win - 2-1. REPORT.
RB Leipzig - Mainz (tip 1, odds 1,35) - result 8: 0 The best game this afternoon was provided by Leipzig, which humiliated Mainz by as much as 8: 0. A hat trick and five different scorers were harsh on Timo Werner, who could also be out of work tonight as his team does not play at the Bundesliga level. REPORT.
CLUB BRIZH - KORTRTAJK (type 1, odds 1,20) - result 3: 0No after 14 rounds Club Bruges knows of defeat in Belgium. The blue-and-white from Jan Brejdel Stadium is lower performing and already has a tangible advantage over rivals. But, more importantly, Philip Clement's team played flawlessly, so against Kortrijk the question about the final outcome was never raised - 3: 0. REPORT.
BENFIKA - RIO AVE (type 1, odds 1,32) - Score 2: 0Benfica does everything to kill morale to direct rivals for the title! The Lions finished another match without a scratch. It was easy to fall on Rio Ave (2-0). The last goal in the Championship was received by the Lions on September 21 from Moreirense. Since then, they have tightened their defenses and offered fans triumphs without much stress. There was a lot of applause this evening at the Puddle. Benfica's golden child Ruben Diaz scored in the 100th match for the first team. REPORT.
TORINO - JUVENTUS (type 2, odds 1.55) - 0: 1 result In the derby of Mole, Juve defeated Toro with a minimum (1: 0) and deepened his agony, and the central figure of the match was stopper Matthias de Liecht. The Dutchman was initially able to match Juventus when the referee looked through his fingers for obvious hand play, then scored the only goal of the match and found the code for the almighty Salvatore Sirigu on the Granata goal. Had Toro scored, the experienced goalkeeper would have been the hero of the feat without any dilemma. And even so, he was probably the best individual of the match. REPORT.
AZ ALKMAR - TVENTE (tip 1, odds 1,18) - result 3: 0Three last matches - 13 goals of AZ! To which the Alkmar durlin hangs, only the buttons remain. Six pieces to Astani (6-0), four PSVs to Eindhoven (4-0) and three to Twente tonight (3-0). And all wins without a goal received. Few teams in Europe are currently in such fantastic form both on offense and defensively. REPORT.

PRECRTANO

LEVANTE - BARCELONA (tip 2, odds 1,33) - 3: 1Tamaran, when it seemed that after seven tied victories in all competitions, Barca caught the fly, a new painful landing for the champion of Spain followed. Leo Messi and teammates were cleared in just six minutes on a visit to Valencia against the brilliant Levante, who outplayed them in the second half. Serbia's national team-mate Nemanja Radoj, who made his debut in the new team's jersey, will also be remembered for his valuable victory, after a brilliant left-handed shot from the edge of the penalty area for the final 3-1. REPORT.
SPARTA ROTERDAM - PSV (tip 2, odds 1,85) - result 2: 2 It's almost over! PSV is unlikely to have the strength to run the championship race with Ajax, which became clear after the third tie by teammate Mark van Bommel in Eredvizia. Not a defeat as on the previous two occasions, but a draw with Sparta in Rotterdam (2: 2) is unlikely to please the functionaries of this big club. REPORT.
REAL MADRID - BETIS (Type 1, odd 1.25) - Score 0: 0Levante's first sensational victory over Barcelona, then draw Sevilla and Athletics in a car derby, and now Real Madrid in the middle of Madrid. Because at the Santiago Bernabeu Stadium it was expected that the Royal Club would be able to handle Betis easily, Ruby's company is being tortured this season, but how unpleasant the Verdiblankos are tonight. Real had the ball in his feet, he had more chances, even once kicking the ball into the opponent's net, but in the end he had to come to terms with a goalless draw. REPORT.
